author: topix.com
title: Why phones break: Screens get stronger, yet we demand more - Tri-cityherald.com
text:
There are 1 comment on the Tri-cityherald.com story from Tuesday Sep 29, titled Why phones break: Screens get stronger, yet we demand more . In it, Tri-cityherald.com reports that:
This Aug. 26, 2015 photo shows an Apple iPhone with a cracked screen after a drop test from the DropBot, a robot used to measure the sustainability of a phone to dropping, at the offices of SquareTrade in San Francisco. Despite engineering breakthroughs, screen breakage has become a part of life, the leading type of phone damage.
Join the discussion below, or Read more at Tri-cityherald.com.
